short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically enable and disable desired extensions at scheduled time on selected days

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
● Are you tired of manually disabling and enabling chrome extensions everyday? Yes?

● "Extensions Scheduler" can automatically enable and disable desired extensions at scheduled time on required days.

● Be smart and productive.

● No Ads
